scenario_text.value:
I don’t see him, or Falcomon... Were they
kidnapped too?

You don’t think the same thing that took Aoi
got them, too?

Damn, I was careless! I thought they’d be
okay if they stuck together!

(Their tracks stop suddenly in the middle of
the cafeteria... Were they taken from here?)

(I don’t see any sign of a struggle. It’s
like they were snatched up in an instant...)

What’s with this enemy...? What can we do
against it?

It’s okay, I’ll keep my eyes peeled wide
open! So c’mon, let’s go and save everyone!
